task.title: Turning an Integrated Item Off
task.shortdesc: Integrations may need to be turned off, if your company no longer uses said integration, or it is no longer necessary for the project at hand. It can be quickly turned off from the Boards Page.

step.cmd: From the board page, click the integration button on the top of the screen. (The icon within the button is shaped like an electrical plug).
Click the Board Integrations tab on the top of the screen.
Find the item you wish to turn off and click the green button to turn the integration off.
